title: Question:
author: Sparrow1997
content: BTCI have the ability and understanding of the cryptocurrency ecosystem to create a platform like TORNADO CASH but with bitcoin, i know that this is not very well received by users since people are not very open to using crypto projects, and if something that has to do with crypto does not generate gigantic money profits, they do not care.What drives the use of cryptocurrencies are the cool projects that can be done with them and that is why i am proposing to the table to create this open source platform so that the BTC community can use it if it is willing.It offers a service that mixes potentially identifiable or "tainted" cryptocurrency funds with others, so as to obscure the trail back to the fund's original source anonymize where the BTC comes from since bitcoin is not completely anonymous but pseudonymous. If you have proposals on how the creation of the platform should be for greater security or greater trust, I would love to read them to be able to satisfy your demands.BTC

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Not sure how you get the idea that a mixer (what you're trying to build) is hated in this community. If you take a look around you'll see many users wearing mixer signature campaigns. Also, not everyone uses mixers because their money is tainted, some of them just like privacy. If you do want to build a mixer and want some input, I believe you need to at least propose your own approach first. IIRC, Chipmixer and the latest Whirlwind did this. Nobody would willingly give you suggestions to improve your platform if you don't even know how you're gonna approach it.
